April 1, 2014, Lyn worked with Tammye in the same group

Lyn has a passion for education unlike anything I have ever seen.  I have witnessed first-hand her ability to connect with internal and external clients with her strong expository writing and interpersonal skills, drive production, change lives, focus on program enhancement in both building and deciphering articulation agreements to adjunct teaching to academics to program recruitment.  Lyn understands the why behind it all and uncovers ways to build value in strategic, effective, and highly efficient ways.  I am honored to see her continue to lead the elearning sector by being an extremely dedicated contributor and passionate leader.  I see her achieving greatness on even higher levels and leading the charge to promote graduate programs throughout the country as a mastermind contributor.

Tarrolyn is a hardworking, result oriented, performance driven individual. I have had the pleasure of being her admissions adviser for her graduate program, and subsequently a trusted colleague. Her name comes with integrity,and diligence and a referral or recommendation from Lyn goes a long way.

It is with great pleasure that I recommend Tammye Brownlee.  I have witnessed first hand her passion for business development, creating RFPs, and developing business plans for a myriad of organizations.  Tammye has the drive, charisma, and know-how to get the job done with tenacity and excellence.  She is well able to take a project from inception to completion with no room for error.  Her ability to effortlessly create marketing materials is awe-inspiring.  If you are looking to take your business to new heights, I would highly suggest that you reach out to Tammye.
